alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued July 15 at 7:11PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Warning is cancelled... ...A High Surf Advisory is in effect... * WHAT...Surfs of 10 to 13 ft with locally higher sets. * WHERE...South and east facing shores of all islands. * WHEN...Until Sunday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 711 AOAULI ASO FARAILE IULAI 15 2022 ...Ua faamutaina le Lapata`iga mo Galu Maualuluga... ...Ua iai nei se Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... * MAFUAAGA...O galu e 10 i le 13 futu ma e maualuluga atu i nisi o taimi. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasa`e o le atunu`u. * TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Sa. * AAFIAGA...Tulaga feoloolo. O le a malolosi le fafati o galu ma `aave o le sami, e le saogalemu ai ona auau. E ono vaaia sologa i gataifale.O nisi o taimi, e iai taimi e maualuluga atu galu nai le maualuga sa fuafuaina, e ono faafaigata ai ona folau vaa laiti i uafu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faautagia nei fautuaga mo lou saogalemu.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
